OpenHelpx.title: Open helpx tab.
OpenHelpx.description: If set to false then it won't open helpx.

UsageMeasurement.title: Turn on/off usage Analytics
UsageMeasurement.description: To disable usage measurement, set UsageMeasurement to false in the group policy.

UninstallPopup.title: Show/Hide Uninstall popup for free users
UninstallPopup.description: To disable uninstall popup after user becomes free, set UninstallPopup to false
